alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence; Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 11:44AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN MEIGS... SOUTHEASTERN GALLIA...SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE...PLEASANTS...CENTRAL RITCHIE...MASON...CABELL...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM...TYLER...WIRT... JACKSON AND WOOD COUNTIES... At 1143 AM EST, radar indicated gusty showers located along a line extending from near Sistersville to 9 miles south of Gallipolis. Movement was east at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this line. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Parkersburg, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Ripley, Harrisville, St. Marys, Elizabeth, Middlebourne, Chesapeake, Racine, Proctorville, Barboursville, Ravenswood, Paden City, Milton, Eleanor, Sistersville, Buffalo and Pennsboro. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 131 and 177. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 9 and 29. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 9 and 44.
